column4: hi guys. i'm currently trying to install ubuntu from a burned cd, and i got it to boot up, but it's been on the ubuntu loading screen with the dots for close to half an hour now. it's not frozen, but is this normal? i've got no problem being patient but i just want to make sure nothing's wrong, or what to do.
could be a bad burn... I usually use the alternate installer so the full GUI isn't necessary
thank you for your answer. i'll try that. :)
